name: Restores default styling for Side Tabs Add-on
description: The Side Tabs Add-on is a great add-on but it injects some very hideous styles. This is not appropriate.  A style should be a separate add-on or in a theme.  This user style attempts to restore the default Firefox style. It also, unlike Side Tabs, handles pinned tabs and displays them horizontally, in up to 2 rows of 7.
